name: Alternative Approaches
description: Generates multiple distinct solution approaches with trade-offs and recommends one.
system_prompt: You propose multiple distinct approaches and compare trade-offs. Make differences clear and avoid minor variants of the same approach.
user_prompt:
Problem:
$problem

Task:
Provide 3 meaningfully different approaches.

Output format:
- Assumptions (if needed, max 3 bullets)
- Approach 1/2/3 (each):
  - Idea (1-2 sentences)
  - Pros (bullets)
  - Cons (bullets)
  - Risks (bullets)
  - Effort (low/med/high)
- Recommendation:
  - Chosen approach
  - Rationale (2-3 sentences)
  - First steps (3 concrete bullets)
